info.description: Pitney Bowes Tax Calculator allows anyone to determine local tax jurisdictions & tax rates in the United States based on address inputs or location coordinates
info.title: Pitney Bowes Tax Calculator

tags.name: GeoTax Service
tags.description: Local Tax. Add local tax rates to your applications, business processes, and workflows. The GeoTAX API returns local tax rates with the input of location coordinates or addresses. Critical for any billing, commerce, payment, or payroll application or service.

get.description: This service calculates and returns taxes applicable at a specific address. Address, purchase amount and supported tax rate type are inputs to the service.

parameters.name: purchaseAmount
parameters.description: The amount on which tax to be calculated.

post.description: This is a Batch offering for 'Tax By Address' service. It accepts a single address, purchase amount or a list of addresses, purchase amounts and retrieve applicable taxes.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: TaxAddressRequest Class Object having tax request.

get.description: This service calculates and returns tax applicable at a specific location. Longitude, latitude, purchase amount and supported tax rate type are inputs to the service.

parameters.name: purchaseAmount
parameters.description: The amount on which tax to be calculated.

post.description: This is a Batch offering for 'Tax By Location' service. It accepts a single location coordinate, purchase amount or a list of location coordinates, purchase amounts and retrieve applicable tax.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: TaxAddressRequest Class Object having tax request.

get.description: Retrieves tax rates applicable to a specific address. This service accepts address and supported tax rate type as inputs to retrieve applicable tax rates.

post.description: This is a Batch offering for 'Taxrate By Address' service. It accepts a single address or a list of addresses and retrieve applicable tax rates.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: TaxRateAddressRequest Class Object having tax rate request.

get.description: Retrieves tax rates applicable to a specific location. This service accepts longitude, latitude and supported tax rate type as inputs to retrieve applicable tax rates.

post.description: This is a Batch offering for 'Taxrate By Location' service. It accepts a single location coordinate or a list of location coordinates and retrieve applicable tax rates.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: TaxRateLocationRequest Class Object having tax rate request.

get.description: This will accept 'address' as a parameter and will return one or many IPDs details for that region in which address will fall.

parameters.name: returnLatLongFields
parameters.description: This preference Option sets flag for returning geometry coordinates(Y/N)

parameters.name: latLongFormat
parameters.description: (default is Decimal) - Returns Desired Latitude Longitude Format

post.summary: Get IPD Tax for batch requests
post.description: Get IPD Tax for batch requests

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: IPDTaxByAddressBatchRequest Class Object having IPD tax request

confidence.x-ms-summary: Probability that the point falls in the specified Place

numOfIpdsFound.x-ms-summary: Number of Insurance Premium Tax Districts
